title: Rise Up, All Ye Slaves of Evil

verses.html:
1
Rise up! All ye slaves of evil,
Sin too long has oppressed and enchained you.
See now! Christ is mankind’s Saviour;
He can free you and your strength renew.

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Rise up! Rise up! All ye slaves of evil!
Rise up! Be free! Forsake your sinful past.
Follow the Cross, to victory at last.

2
Rise up! All ye slaves of evil,
Night too long has blinded and deceived you.
See now! Christ is mankind’s true light;
Your eyes He can with new sight endue.

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
Rise up! Rise up! All ye slaves of evil!
Rise up! Be free! Forsake your sinful past.
Follow the Cross, to victory at last.

3
Rise up! All ye slaves of evil,
Make His goodness your goal of endeavor.
See now! Jesus and His Kingdom
Shine before you forever and ever.

verses.label: 3C
verses.html:
3
Rise up! Rise up! All ye slaves of evil!
Rise up! Be free! Forsake your sinful past.
Follow the Cross, to victory at last.
